selection_reasoning: Carry forward the top performer (trial_0_7) and second-best (trial_0_3) for exploitation, plus three diverse/potential approaches (penalty L-BFGS-B in trial_0_4, force-directed centers in trial_0_1, and basin-hopping in trial_0_2) to maintain methodological diversity and headroom for improvement.

trial_selections.reasoning: Best score (2.587959). Unconstrained reparameterization with L-BFGS-B + LP cleanup reached the top performance; strong base to refine via restarts/annealing.
Second-best (2.418531). Derivative-free alternating center search + LP is a complementary paradigm to gradient methods; promising with step/selection tuning.
Solid mid-high score (2.086355). Multi-stage penalty L-BFGS-B with barriers; likely to improve with better annealing and initialization diversity.
Center-only force-directed spreading + LP. Different objective geometry; good candidate for hyperparameter refinement and better seeding.
Basin-hopping global search is conceptually valuable despite low initial score; worth revisiting with corrected hop moves and stronger local solver.
